plot: Ukuku is a mythological Andean being, half bear - half human, whose duty is to retrieve sacred mountain ice. In the short, an Ukuku climbs to the peaks and finds no ice. Wise Mama Coca points the Ukuku on his quest, traversing Peru's territory. His journey takes him to the modern coast, where he will find ice and an unexpected destiny.   Written by  Anonymous
title: Ukuku
